ARIAZ

Introduction

Jang HyoGyung is a South Korean singer. She is a former member of the girl group ARIAZ. She first appeared in public through MIXNINE where she entered the Girls Debut Team, before making her Official Debut on October 24th, 2019 with ARIAZ.

In 2024 HyoGyung debuted as a solo artist HEYA with the release of her single titled "Gunshot"

Fun facts

1
Heya can play several instruments including the guitar and the piano.
…
2
Heya's friends gave her the nickname "Frog" because she has a very small head with very big eyes.
…
3
Yang Hyunsuk described Heya as a "Genius" since she made an impressive freestyle rap right in front of him. She also composes and writes her own songs, which she released on music portals since the age of 13!
